channel.title: super market on Aashiyana of Pamela Santanu
channel.description: Recent content in super market on Aashiyana of Pamela Santanu

item.title: Whatz FRESH about Reliance Fresh ?
item.description: As we are new to Bangalore trying to explore all nearby hypermarket, supermarket and open markets as we settle in. This is also giving us as chance to explore places around. The first one we tried and explored was BIG-BAZAR on Old Madras road. As it is just near to one of our office address in Bangalore I knew how to reach there without being lost. Then weekend after we tried SPAR at Kormongala followed by Nilgiris.
